entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

CLOUDY
RAIN, MAINLY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S
TEMPERATURE FALLING TO AROUND 30 IN THE AFTERNOON
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS 15 TO 20

MOSTLY SUNNY AND COOLER
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 20

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

entry.em: MARTIN LUTHER KING JR DAY THROUGH TUESDAY
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 20
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
